Access to Justice in Kassala State FebraruyHS-SN.doc
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/SDN/00047458/Access to Justice in Kassala State FebraruyHS-SN.doc

outputs.output_descr: To ensure sustainability and relevance to adequately address the needs of vulnerable groups, UNDP will conduct workshops for IDP population, traditional leaders and other stakeholders to raise awareness of the judicial system and rule of law concepts.
Communities and vulnerable groups have increased access to equitable and efficient justice and legal aid service.

project_descr: Strengthen access to justice and accountability of rule of law institutions to: establish a solid foundation for development; facilitate access to justice for vulnerable groups, create an environment that is conducive to sustainable peace and development
project_title: Access to Justice & Confidence building in Kassala & Kht
